Title: Real Silverlight controls
Description: Some handy controls for all your Silverlight applications.
HomeWiki:
Real Silverlight controls is a control libray for Silverlight 4.
On this moment it is in béta phase and includes 2 controls:

- IPhone (like) switchbutton
- Synchronous scrolling DataGrid
- Self validating DatePicker

For more infomation about the control, please visit my blog: http://reynaerta.wordpress.com/
